Know B_system Features

Well organized and layered

Elements are intuitively organized and well named, so you can quickly customize your design.

Learn more
Google fonts

The fonts used by Brand System are free and easy to find on Google fonts.

Learn more
Responsive components

Each of the components is built so that it can be resized depending on the device.
